name: Cup the Ball
description:
DESCRIPTION

This game is all about BOUNCINESS! You have a mission of trying to get your ball into one of the cups located at the bottom of the screen. But keep your eyes open, because there are a plethora of obstacles waiting to obstruct your way of getting to 'em cups! You have a limited number of balls per each level, so be sure to use them carefully. Do you have the skills to hop through all the 10 levels without a problem? : )

CONTROLS

- Left-click to shoot your ball. On mobile devices the controls are basically the same.

MORE!

If you happen to find any bugs within the game, please report them in the comment section down below. Also be sure to let me know what you thought of the gameplay. I may or may not update the game sometime in the future, but suggestions are always appreciated.

This game took a total of 3 days to create. All of the assets within the game were created by me.
